name: teethe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a baby or small child is teething, their first teeth are growing, usually causing pain: My sister was up most of the night with her baby who's teething.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a baby or small child) to grow teeth: The baby was often cranky because she was teething.
